result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Crystal Chemire Thomas
Current: 8506 W Congress St Apt 8, Milwaukee, WI 53225 United States  (Effective: 10-19-2017)
Prior: LKA: 4623 West Olive St., Milwaukee, WI 53216
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from the Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.  Court makes finding that there is no possible victim identified, therefore, recompense is not an issue.
Court amended the criminal complaint to reflect the correct date of birth.

ADDRESS INFO for Crystal Chemire Thomas
Current: LKA: 4623 West Olive St., Milwaukee, WI 53216   (Effective: 03-28-2016)
Prior: 4436 N 92nd St. Apt 1, Milwaukee, WI 53225

Defendant Crystal Chemire Thomas in court with attorney Joel H. Rosenthal.  Defendant Crystal Chemire Thomas in custody.  Dennis Patrick Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for a return of an arrest warrant and initial appearance. Defense counsel informed the court that this is a case of mistaken identity. Case passed for further investigation. Back on the record at 11:49. State concedes the person in court is not the correct person associated with this case. Court ordered this person released from custody, all warrants associated with this person withdrawn, and that an arrest warrant be issued for the correct defendant.

ADDRESS INFO for Crystal Chemire Thomas
Current: 4436 N 92nd St. Apt 1, Milwaukee, WI 53225   (Effective: 03-28-2016)
Prior: 4623 West Olive St, Milwaukee, WI 53216
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.
An initial appearance will have to be done on this case when the correct defendant is in court.

Defendant Crystal Chemire Thomas not in court.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Crystal Chimere Thomas in court, brought to court on mistaken identity. Defendant failing to appear on 6/25/15, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from the Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.  Court makes finding that there is no possible victim identified, therefore, recompense is not an issue.

Defendant Crystal Chemire Thomas in court.  Paul M. Hauer appeared for the State of Wisconsin. State requesting Defendant to show State Identication.  Status conference scheduled for October 5, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Crystal Chemire Thomas in court.  Paul M. Hauer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant.  Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant was given a referral to the Public Defender's Office. Defendant MAY be Public Defender eligible. The case is adjourned for a Status Conference in Br. CCCR. Defendant states that this is mistaken identity regarding this case. State request that the Defendant provide State Identification. Defendant did provide proof that the she did not live in the State of Wisconsin at during the time of the alleged offense. Court will adjourn the case back before the Commissioner.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Crystal Chemire Thomas not in court.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from the Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.  Court makes finding that there is no possible victim identified, therefore, recompense is not an issue.
SUMMONS MAILED. DEFENDANT ORDERED INTO ROOM 221 SAFETY BUILDING ON 6/25/15 @ 1:30 pm
